name: coyote
content:
coyote noun [C]
(ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
plural coyote or coyotes a small wild animal like a dog that lives in North America: Some birds are killed by golden eagles or coyotes. The only sound is the howl of coyote and the whisper of the wind.
David C Stephens/Moment/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThere may be a cougar or coyote waiting in the brush.Chickens need protection from predators such as coyotes, foxes, and owls. Suddenly a large male coyote walked out of the trees.

coyote noun [C]
(SMUGGLER)
US informal a person who is paid to secretly and illegally bring people across the border into the US from Latin America: They still owe thousands of dollars to the coyotes who brought her and her children across the border.
More examplesFewer examplesSergio decided to make the trip with a coyote, who would sneak a group of illegal immigrants into the US through Arizona.He paid a coyote $1,200 and filled a backpack with food and clothes.
